values.value: Perform a formal information security risk assessment to identify threats and vulnerabilities to information assets stored and processed in Salesforce. ISO 27001 requires a systematic approach to risk identification, analysis, and evaluation to determine appropriate controls.

Define a risk assessment methodology including criteria for risk acceptance, likelihood, and impact scales. Identify all information assets within Salesforce and classify them by sensitivity level. Analyze threats and vulnerabilities for each asset and calculate residual risk after existing controls. Document the risk treatment plan with control selections from Annex A and review the assessment at least annually or after significant changes.
